title: Healing Your Relationship with Food
subtitle: From struggle to nourishment
description: For anyone whose relationship with food has become complicated. Moving beyond diets, guilt, and control toward genuine nourishment.

questions.question: Why do diets typically fail long-term?
options: They create restriction cycles that backfire biologically and psychologically
People don't want to be healthy
Diets work if you try hard enough

questions.question: What is the foundation of a healthy relationship with food?
options: Attuning to your body's signals and eating without moral judgment
